synopsis.text: Moteuchi Yota, a young man nursing a broken heart after his crush, Moemi, confesses her love for his best friend, stumbles upon an unusual video store named "Gokuraku" and is given a mysterious video by the store's insistent manager. Upon playing the tape in his damaged VCR, a beautiful video girl named Ai Amano magically emerges from his TV screen. Ai's purpose is to console the viewer, but due to the faulty VCR, her character and appearance are somewhat affected. Despite this, Ai takes a liking to Yota's selfless devotion towards Moemi and vows to help him win her heart. With only a month before she vanishes back into the video, Ai embarks on a mission to guide Yota through the complexities of love and help him find true happiness in this enchanting and heartwarming tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
